analysis: The documents all pertain to labor disputes that threaten to disrupt interstate commerce or imperil national health and safety. They involve various industries including railway, airline, telephone, meat-packing, copper mining, maritime, atomic energy, and aerospace. The disputes often involve disagreements between companies and unions, leading to potential strikes or lockouts. The documents establish boards of inquiry or emergency boards to investigate the disputes and prevent disruptions.
title: Labor Dispute Intervention
